episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a variety of quirky and intriguing topics, including the surprising dislike cats have for cat enthusiasts, the poetic lineage of Confucius' descendants, a two-headed tortoise with differing food preferences, and the original medicinal use of Jägermeister.

facts.fact: Researchers have concluded that cats don't like cat people.
If you take 50 generations of Confucius descendants and read out their names from oldest to youngest, in it it will reveal a secret poem.
There is a two-headed tortoise in Switzerland whose two heads prefer different foods.
Jägermeister was originally drunk to stop people from feeling sick.
